name: Swipe & Conquer 2048
description:
Swipe, expand, conquer! Swipe & Conquer 2048 is a unique puzzle game where players build, conquer and expand their territory in an online multiplayer map.

Key features:
  • Swipe buildings to merge and level up
  • Build and expand territory with residential, farm and factory buildings
  • Balance resources produced by buildings like workers, food and materials to support military
  • Use military units to conquer neighbour's land and expand your border
  • Challenge other with limited time attack to grab their land, colonise and build bigger population
  • Perfect your empire by replay already built city
  • Use advanced building tools to change the layout of the city
